major: Nutrition & Health Sciences: Nutrition & Dietetics Option

Nutrition & Dietetics.1: Attain the science and research foundation required for evidence-based practice as a registered dietitian.
Nutrition & Dietetics.2: Demonstrate professional values, attitudes, and behaviors for a career as a registered dietitian.
Nutrition & Dietetics.3: Articulate the role of nutrition and lifestyle choices in health promotion and disease prevention.
Nutrition & Dietetics.4: Demonstrate a variety of effective education and counseling methods required for facilitation of behavior change.
Nutrition & Dietetics.5: Apply the nutrition care process in the delivery of medical nutrition therapy in a variety of settings.
Nutrition & Dietetics.6: Apply management and business theories and principles required to deliver programs and services.
